histogram.name: Ash.Growth.CampaignsComponent.DownloadDurationInOobe
histogram.summary: Records the time (in ms) the Campaigns Manager takes to download the campaigns component from Omaha during OOBE flow. Recorded when loading the campaigns component in OOBE flow has completed. This metric was split from Ash.Growth.CampaignsComponent.DownloadDuration in M124.

histogram.name: Ash.Growth.CampaignsComponent.DownloadDurationSessionStart
histogram.summary: Records the time (in ms) the Campaigns Manager takes to download the campaigns component from Omaha during session start. Recorded when loading the campaigns component at session start has completed. This metric was split from Ash.Growth.CampaignsComponent.DownloadDuration in M124.

histogram.name: Ash.Growth.CampaignsComponent.ParseDuration
histogram.summary: Records the time (in ms) the Campaigns Manager takes to read and parsed (as JSON) from disk. Recorded when a component is loaded into Campaign Matcher.

histogram.name: Ash.Growth.CampaignsManager.Error
histogram.summary: Tracks unexpected error while loading and matching campaigns. Recorded each time an unexpected error occurs.

histogram.name: Ash.Growth.CampaignsManager.GetCampaignBySlot
histogram.summary: Tracks the slot of the fetched campaign. Recorded each time a campaign is fetched.

histogram.name: Ash.Growth.CampaignsManager.MatchDuration
histogram.summary: Records the time (in ms) the Campaigns Manager takes to match a campaign based on the targeting criteria. Recorded when fetching a campaign for a particular slot completed.

histogram.name: Ash.Growth.Ui.ButtonPressed.Button{ButtonId}.Campaigns500
histogram.summary: Recorded when the button of {ButtonId} in the UI is pressed. The bucket is indexed by the campaign_id. The campaign_id recorded in this histogram should be less than 500.

histogram.name: Ash.Growth.Ui.Dismissed.Campaigns500
histogram.summary: Recorded when the UI is dismissed. The bucket is indexed by the campaign_id. The campaign_id recorded in this histogram should be less than 500.

histogram.name: Ash.Growth.Ui.Impression.Campaigns500
histogram.summary: Recorded when it is ready to log a UI impression. Normally this is called right after a call to show the UI. The bucket is indexed by the campaign_id. The campaign_id recorded in this histogram should be less than 500.
